---
category: news
title: "How AI Could Shake Up Alternative Financing"
excerpt: "The financial services sector has historically resisted large-scale change until new offerings were sufficiently vetted, easily deployable and standardized. Innovations such as credit cards, electronic payment systems, blockchains and peer-to-peer lending took several years to be embraced in the banking and finance industries."
